laboratory_examinations.findings: A few mucosal polyps with diameter less than 5 mm were detected in the rectum, while approximately 30-35 polyps were found in all of the other colon segments. Colonic polyps were adenomatous polyps with mild and severe dysplasia; rectal polyps were adenomatous polyps with mild dysplasia.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Adenomatous polyposis coli (APC) gene mutation test
